title: Underware interview
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108015343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/underware_6245.gif)
  
We just posted a rather lengthy interview with Dutch/German/Finnish type design collective [Underware](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108015343/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Underware) over at Néojaponisme. The interview includes a rather gigantor image gallery. Come on over and take a look!  
 [http://neojaponisme.com/2007/11/07/underware/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108015343/http:/neojaponisme.com/2007/11/07/underware/ "http://neojaponisme.com/2007/11/07/underware/")
author: ilynam

comments.content: Thanks for posting the link, Ian!
Thanks for posting this. I'm a _huge_ Underware fan.
